tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PaymentInformation (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    card_number TEXT,
    cardholder_name TEXT,
    expiration_date DATE,
    cvv TEXT,
    encrypted_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE EncryptionKeys (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	encryption_key VARCHAR (255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE EncryptedData (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	encrypted_content TEXT NOT NULL,
	encryption_key_id INTEGER REFERENCES EncryptionKeys (id)
)

CREATE TABLE DecryptionKeys (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	decryption_key VARCHAR (255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE DecryptedData (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	decrypted_content TEXT NOT NULL,
	decryption_key_id INTEGER REFERENCES DecryptionKeys (id)
)

CREATE TABLE PaymentInformation (
	id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	payment_data TEXT NOT NULL,
	payment_method VARCHAR (50) NOT NULL
)
